mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COURSE (CCAT_CODE, COURSE_NAME, COURSE_CONTENT, COURSE_LIMIT, COURSE_START_DATE, COURSE_END_DATE, TEA_CODE, COURSE_START_TIME, COURSE_END_TIME, COURSE_DAY) VALUES ( #{ccatCode}, #{courseName}, #{courseContent}, #{courseLimit}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{teacherCode}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{courseDay} )
